name: Failing Flailing Familiar
description:
A short sidescrolling puzzle game, where you, a wizard's trusty familiar, must try to protect your master's latest creation that has somehow broken free and is running through the castle completely out of control - the Shambler!

Alas, the Shambler is out of control and will not heed any kind of instructions. To keep it safe, you'll need to clear its path of obstacles, open doors, activate magic portals, and avoid traps. The Shambler's speed is also random - sometimes fast, sometimes slow!

Controls:

W, A, S, D - movement

Left click - Pull Items

Right click - Push items

Fly into switches to activate them.

The later levels can be difficult, but you can retry as many times as you like.

Please be gentle! This is the first game we've released :-)

Entry for 2020 GMTK Game Jam, made with 48 hours for the theme 'Out of Control'
